content: प्रावृषेण्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Produced in, relating to, the rainy season; सा किं शक्या जनयितुमिह प्रावृषेण्येन… वारिदेन <ls>Bv. 1. 30</ls>; <ls n="Bv.">4. 6</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 36.</ls> {@--2@} Abundant, copious, much (<ab>lit.</ab> coming in showers). {@--3@} To be paid in the rainy season (as a debt &c.). --ण्यः {@--1@} The Kadamba tree. {@--2@} The Kuṭaja tree. --ण्यं Numerousness, abundance, plenty.
